title: Sports: Volleyball (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Volleyball subcategory within Sports. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: I used to belong to a volleyball club.
cards.romaji: Bar.b ru bu ni shozoku shite imashita.
cards.japanese: バレーボール部に所属していました。

cards.english: In Japanese volleyball, there is a unique system of a nine player team.
cards.romaji: Nihon no bar.b ru niwa, ky.nins. bar. toy. tokubetsuna s.do ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: 日本のバレーボールには、九人制バレーという特別な制度があります。
